p.n: Master And Commander: The Far Side Of The World
p.k: 74% Outgunned but defiant, captain Russell Crowe and his fearless crew hunt a French warship. Rip-roaring epic
72% New kid Daniel stands up to his bullies with the help of karate master Mr Miyagi in this family favourite. Starring Ralph Macchio and Pat Morita
High-kicking karate student Daniel and his mentor Mr Miyagi travel to Japan to settle an old score. Family action sequel with Pat Morita and Ralph Macchio
Hothead Daniel dumps Mr Miyagi for a new coach. But without his ally, can the youngster defeat the toxic waste baron who is training an old enemy?
77% Ben Affleck's CIA agent is charged with bringing home six Americans stranded in revolutionary Iran. Oscar-winning thriller
78% Sean Astin, Corey Feldman and Josh Brolin star in this comedy adventure following a group of kids on their perilous search for pirate treasure
77% Veteran cop Danny Glover and suicidal young maverick Mel Gibson team up in the quest to thwart a drug-smuggling operation
73% Rapid-fire action sequel with Mel Gibson and Danny Glover as the bickering cops closing the net on a mob of South African drug smugglers
